sentence: Clean room heating system was vey good Location is the best close to public transportation many good place to go and eat like little petes Federal Donut
Perfect location nice rooms
Room service with a nice selection of food
Love To Wreck a Room
TV Channel guide
Great lounge bar friendly staff and clean rooms with great showers
The lobby and rooms are decorated gorgeously and are immaculately clean
The bathroom with a rainshower head and all marble counters very nice
I and my traveling companion had an ok experience here great location nice sized room the usual comfortable Westin bed
The rooms are well appointed and clean
Went downstairs to complain and they gave us another room which we had to wait an hour and a half for
This was not the construction downstairs I actually walked out of my room to see a repair man in the next room over
Went into the new rom extremely dusty musty smell and huge brown stain in the comforter
The first of which was that my initial room did smell strongly of cigarette smoke

The club sandwich and au jus arrived cold and soggy bread and the cheesecake had been in the refrigerator so long that the crust went soft when it was supposed to be crunchy cokiethe room was falling apart handles off dressers door stops hanging off rust in bathroom etcI love Westins but this one is not worth your time or money
water and complimentary coffee were not sufficiently stocked either ran out before 4 pm each day or was not stocked at all
It took 115 for a room at which time I was already out and around town
Arrived at 400 PM on Saturday and was told that there was a waiting list for rooms
Either way we got our drinks and enjoyed them in our room
We were given a free drink voucher from the front desk at check in and were looking forward to sitting in the place we saw online and not a make shift bar in a conference room
